item.title: Biking in Serbia
item.description: The speed limits are as you can see in the picture that I took from the internet. In the motorways are numbered and prefixed with the letter A, the non motoway main roads are numbered, the smaller roads just have the names of the town that they lead to on the signs. The Serbian motorways and the non motorway main roads that I rode on are of a good standard, the condition of the smaller roads are generally good but there is always the odd exception.
